channel.title: Road to maxed Turm rune/zerk pure
channel.description:
Okay, I was orginally a pure, but got bored of being a pure, because everytime i went pking i'd get gmaul/claw rushed 24-7. so i thought why not turn into a rune/zerk turm pure. I just need to get the money for turmoil, shouldn't take too long i guess, just got to keep going. xD NOTE: I HAVE QUESTED THE DEF. Here is my progress At the moment. [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2vufr10.png[/img]
But yeah if you have any ideas ect, just leme know. :D

He’s not a zerker though.[/quote]
Nice mate, it’s coming along well.

Read full topic

item.title: Road to maxed Turm rune/zerk pure
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:5, topic:445274”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=547954.msg4018134#msg4018134 date=1339800454]
read bts, pures and zerks are going to fail
[/quote]
Because your interpretation of what they stated is definitely correct, no doubt

But seriously, they haven’t said anything about them ‘failing’. Don’t blatantly state your unprovable conclusions.[/quote]
You missunderstand pking then good sir. I’ll post my explanation after I sleep, but fyi yes pures will be fine against other pures but who would willingly give themself a HUGE disadvantage especially pures who are pures to give themself an advantage over other players - even other pures.
